"Item"
{
	"ID" "ITEM_BEE2_TURRET_DROPPER_BETTER"
	"Description"
	{
		"" "A Dropper which dispenses Turrets.  "
		"" ""
		"" "* Since Turrets are unstable, they are lowered to the floor on a cable."
		"" "* The Auto-Drop and Respawn checkboxes function the same as normal Cube Droppers."
		"" "* If Auto-Respawn is enabled, Turrets will additionally respawn when coated in Repulsion Gel or knocked over."
		"" "* If Start Reversed is checked, Turrets will not auto-fizzle when coated in Repulsion Gel or knocked over. Only clean and p1 are supported."
		"" "* If Start Active is checked, nothing happens. At some point it will allow turrets to be grabbed while being dropped."
	}
	"Version"
	{
		"Styles"
		{
			"BEE2_CLEAN" "turret_dropper_better"
			"BEE2_PORTAL_1"
			{
				"Base" "BEE2_CLEAN"
				"Replace"
				{
					"BEE2_CUBE_DROPPER_CLEAN_CAP" "BEE2_TURRET_DROPPER_P1_CAP"
				}
				"Instances"
				{
					"0" "instances/BEE2/p1/items/dropper_turret_better.vmf"
				}
			}
			"BEE2_OVERGROWN"
			{
				"Base" "BEE2_CLEAN"
				"Instances"
				{
					"0" "instances/BEE2/over/items/dropper_turret.vmf"
				}
			}
			"BEE2_1950s"
				{
				"Base" "BEE2_CLEAN"
				"Replace"
				{
					"BEE2_CUBE_DROPPER_CLEAN_CAP" "BEE2_CUBE_DROPPER_RETRO_CAP"
					// Distance extra to move
					"22"    "166"
				}
				"Append"
				{
					"Conditions"
					{
						"Condition"
						{
							"instance"	"<ITEM_BEE2_TURRET_DROPPER_BETTER>"
							"Result"
							{
								"AddOverlay" "<ITEM_BEE2_TURRET_DROPPER_BETTER:bee2_turr>"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				"Instances"
				{
					"0"         "instances/BEE2/50s/items/dropper_turret.vmf"

				}
			}
